revised_title: Study of Thallium Vapour Absorption and Auto-Ionization Phenomena
tldr: The authors conducted experiments to study the absorption of light by thallium vapour and observed auto-ionization phenomena. They measured the atomic cross-section at various wavelengths and found that the absorption cross-section at the series limit is the highest among the metallic cross-sections determined so far. The authors also discussed the probability of radiationless transitions, the effects of auto-ionization on the absorption lines, and the need for further experimental and theoretical studies to understand these transitions better.
